text: int max ( int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int i ; int a [ 99 ] [ 99 ] ; int b [ 99 ] [ 99 ] = { 0 } ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { int n ; int j , k ; int maximum = INT_MIN ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < j + 1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } b [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { b [ j ] [ 0 ] = b [ j - 1 ] [ 0 ] + a [ j ] [ 0 ] ; } for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 1 ; k < j + 1 ; k ++ ) { b [ j ] [ k ] = a [ j ] [ k ] + ( max ( b [ j - 1 ] [ k ] , b [ j - 1 ] [ k - 1 ] ) ) ; if ( j == n - 1 && b [ j ] [ k ] > maximum ) maximum = b [ j ] [ k ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , maximum ) ; } return 0 ; } int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; return b ; }
